Title: fromUnixTimestamp64Micro
Description: Converts an Int64 to a DateTime64 value with fixed microsecond precision and optional timezone. The input value is scaled up or down appropriately depending on its precision.
NotePlease note that input value is treated as a UTC timestamp, not timestamp at the given (or implicit) timezone.
value — value with any precision. Int64.timezone — (optional) timezone name of the result. String.
value converted to DateTime64 with precision 6. DateTime64.
Examples: WITH CAST(1234567891011, 'Int64') AS i64SELECT    fromUnixTimestamp64Micro(i64, 'UTC') AS x,    toTypeName(x);
